com.gwtplatform.mvp.client
Interface UiHandlers

All Known Subinterfaces:
CarsUiHandlers, CarUiHandlers, EditManufacturerUiHandlers, EditRatingUiHandlers, HeaderUiHandlers, LoginUiHandlers, ManufacturerDetailUiHandlers, ManufacturerUiHandlers, NavigationUiHandlers, RatingDetailUiHandlers, RatingUiHandlers
All Known Implementing Classes:
CarPresenter, CarsPresenter, EditManufacturerPresenter, EditRatingPresenter, HeaderPresenter, LoginPresenter, ManufacturerDetailPresenter, ManufacturerPresenter, NavigationTabPresenter, RatingDetailPresenter, RatingPresenter
public interface UiHandlers

Use this marker interface on classes that implement the controls required by a View to communicate back with its Presenter or PresenterWidget.

Author:
Christian Goudreau
